name: Federal Permitting Improvement Steering Council Environmental Review Improvement Fund (ERIF) Funding Program
objective: Providing financial assistance to Tribal governments to facilitate timely and efficient environmental reviews and authorizations of FAST-41 projects.

results.description: In 2024, the Permitting Council plans to issue a funding opportunity for Tribal governments to facilitate timely and efficient environmental reviews and authorizations of FAST-41 covered projects.

authorizations.text: Fixing America's Surface Transportation Act, Title 41. Pub. L. 114, 94.
42 USC Chapter 55, Subchapter IV; Federal Permitting Improvement U.S.C. § 4370m-8(d)(3).
